archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1210
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to add multiple products, services, devices etc. to a mini cart to calculate the total cost in real time.

properties.value: DS: UX to be aligned, has impact on the process. Multiple items can be added to the basket at the same time, but more info is needed to set some boundaries. Flow should be as easy as possible

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
